about_the_game:
Welcome to Cyber Revolution, a third-person shooter set in the distant future! You become part of an elite squad sent to the Omicron-7 star system to defend humanity's colonies from invading alien invaders. On this planet, energy is your key to victory. Collect energy boxes, upgrade your weapons and abilities to fight the growing threats. Every battle requires strategy, and every decision can be crucial to the outcome of the battle.

Explore mysterious locations, from ruined space cities to desolate lunar valleys. Uncover the secrets hidden in the depths of this star system and discover who is behind an invasion that threatens to destroy all of humanity.

Game Features:

- Unique energy mechanics: collect energy boxes to boost your abilities and weapons.

- Uncompromising battles: dynamic battles with intelligent enemies that adapt to your actions.

- Variety of locations: futuristic cities, uninhabited moons, destroyed stations and more.

- Character progression: improve your skills, unlock new abilities and customize your gear.

- Unique atmosphere: immerse yourself in the dark but exciting world of the distant future.

- Plot with unexpected twists and turns

short_description: Cyber Revolution is a third-person shooter where you venture into a distant star system to stop an alien invasion. Fight for survival, collect energy from special boxes to power up your weapons, and destroy your foes.
